Annotation.String: The ThermalMetrics schema represents the thermal metrics of a chassis.
This resource shall represent the thermal metrics of a chassis for a Redfish implementation.
This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.
The summary temperature readings for this chassis.
This property shall contain the temperature sensor readings for this subsystem.
The temperatures (Celsius) from all related sensors for this device.

This property shall contain the temperatures, in degrees Celsius units, for this subsystem. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.
The available actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
The temperature readings for a subsystem.
This type shall contain properties that describe temperature sensor for a subsystem.
The internal temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.

This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the internal temperature of this subsystem. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.
The intake temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.

This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the intake temperature of this subsystem. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.
The exhaust temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.

This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the exhaust temperature of this subsystem. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.
The ambient temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.

This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the ambient temperature of this subsystem. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.
The available actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This version was created to update descriptions to tie excerpt property definitions to a specific type of Sensor or Control. It was also created to correct various typographical errors.
The summary of heater metrics for this chassis.
This property shall contain the summary of heater metrics for this subsystem.
The heater metrics summary for the subsystem.
This type shall contain properties that describe the heater metrics summary for the subsystem.
The total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered off.
This property shall contain the total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered off.
The total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered on.
This property shall contain the total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered on.
The differential pressure (kPa).

This property shall contain the pressure, in kilopascal units, for the difference in pressure between the air intake and air exhaust of this chassis. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `PressurekPa`.
The air flow through the chassis (m^3/min).

This property shall contain the rate of air flow, in cubic meters per minute units, between the air intake and air exhaust of this chassis. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `AirFlowCMM`.
